Deficiency Narrative: Staff member overheard child's phone conversation.
Correction Narrative: There is no risk present at the operation. There are no placements at the operation. The operation has voluntarily closed and is not operating.

Deficiency Narrative: A child in care with a history of diabetes was not properly supervised during an outing, where the child was able to purchase an item that may have caused potential harm to the child when consuming it.
Correction Narrative: There is no risk present at the operation. There are no placements at the operation. The operation has closed down and is not operating.

Deficiency Narrative: Preliminary service plan for one child out of three reviewed was not completed/ signed within the 72 hour time frame.
Correction Narrative: AMIkids RGV Executive Director will review Youth Intake Check off list with Case Managers by June 7, 2023to ensure completion of Preliminary Service Plan within 72 hours of completion is included.

Deficiency Narrative: Specific actions required in the event that there is a suicide attempt are not documented on the suicide policy.
Correction Narrative: Revised suicide policy was submitted. AMIkids RGV requests a written response from TX DFPS by July 1, 2023 advising the approval or if additional revisions are needed to aforementioned policy.

Deficiency Narrative: Specific actions required in the event the operation finds a child to be high risk for suicide were not documented on suicide prevention policy.
Correction Narrative: Revised suicide policy was submitted. AMIkids RGV requests a written response from TX DFPS by July 1, 2023 advising the approval or if additional revisions are needed to aforementioned policy.

Deficiency Narrative: One employee file was missing the suicide prevention, intervention, and postvention training.
Correction Narrative: All Staff will complete Safety Planning Training Annually.  Current Staff will complete training by 06/30/23.  Exemption to staff who have completed training in 2023. All Staff will complete Suicide Awareness, Participants Training Annually.  Current Staff will complete training by 06/30/23.  Exemption to staff who have completed training in 2023.

Deficiency Narrative: Operation's suicide prevention training curriculum does not meet requierments on minimum standards such as understanding safety planning.
Correction Narrative: All Staff will complete Safety Planning Training Annually.  Current Staff will complete training by 06/30/23.  Exemption to staff who have completed training in 2023. All Staff will complete Suicide Awareness, Participants Training Annually.  Current Staff will complete training by 06/30/23.  Exemption to staff who have completed training in 2023.

Deficiency Narrative: Medication logs reviewed for two children were missing dates and accurate times (AM or PM) medication was given. In addition, medication count was not accurate.
Correction Narrative: AMIkids RGV Nurse will be conducted medication dispensing training with all program staff and maintaining current, true accurate and complete records by June 19, 2023

Deficiency Narrative: Child's record had missing documentation of a unauthorize absence debriefing within the 24 hours of the child's return to the operation. The child's record documentation didn't include the condition of the child, the information of what event occurred while the child was away and any relevant information in regard to the child's health and safety.
Correction Narrative: AMIkids RGV staff will be trained on Youth Unauthorized Absence return procedure.  Training will be completed by June 18, 2023

Deficiency Narrative: Physical altercation occurred after caregiver failed to intervene.
Correction Narrative:
Follow up inspection was completed on 5/10/23 Administrator stated he reviewed the video and did a refresher EBI training with staff.  He stated he has no concern with any staff being able to administer EBI correctly. Mr. Ibarra provided EBI curriculum and sign in sheet of employees who attended the trainings.  He stated one staff present during the incident is no longer employed.  Other female staff present was listed on the sign in sheet.
Administrative review requested 5/1/23.

Deficiency Narrative: Operation failed to update controlling persons list.
Correction Narrative: Controlling persons form for pending person was submitted via email.

Deficiency Narrative: During walk-throught two ziplock bag in the fridge were observed to be open.  One bag of popcorn in kitchen area was observed to be open.
Correction Narrative: During walk-throught two ziplock bag in the fridge were observed to be open.  One bag of popcorn in kitchen area was observed to be open.

Deficiency Narrative: During walkthrough, one child bedroom was observed to not be clean.  Clothes, shoes, and personal belongings were observed on the bed and floor.
Correction Narrative: During walkthrough, one child bedroom was observed to not be clean.  Clothes, shoes, and personal belongings were observed on the bed and floor.

Deficiency Narrative: There was a live scorpion observed in a living area.
Correction Narrative: In regards to deficiencies, AMIkids Rio Grande Valley will contact our exterminator and request pesticide spray specifically for scorpions.  Additional exterminator visits may be required in addition to monthly visit. The program will also install exterior door sweeps to all living area and student classroom doors.  Door sweeps will be purchased at The Home Depot or ordered if not in stock by 6/17/22.  Door threshold to student living areas will be inspected.  If replacement is needed program will contact carpenter request bid for repair and submit repair / replace work order.

Deficiency Narrative: During a walk through of the operaton, three beds used by the minors in care, were found to be missing mattress protectors.
Correction Narrative:
Corrections received from Operation.  In regards to deficiency AMIkids Rio Grande Valley purchased twelve waterproof mattress pads on June 09, 2022. 
AMIkids RGV staff issued new mattress pads to students who were missing them on June 10, 2022. 
Program staff will inspect student mattress daily to ensure mattress pads are in place and remind students mattress pads must be on their bunks at all times. Copy of receipt was provided.

Deficiency Narrative: A caregiver failed to intervene when a youth was displaying risky behavior that placed himself and other youths are risk of slipping or falling on a hard surface.
Correction Narrative:
Email from the agency;
Response: To ensure the agency is  complying with Operation's Safety and Supervision guidelines, including staff interventions.  Training scheduled for July 27, 2022 for AMIkids Rio Grande Valley Staff.  Documents for the training requested.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection one staff members cpr/first aid certification was expired
Correction Narrative:
TD sent an email with the following information: 

I have attached the 2 Normalcy trainings and the 1 CPR/First Aid training that were past due for RV and for Jose LB, for which we were cited.

I have also included a blank Training Tracker which we are using for all staff moving forward so that we remain compliant with required trainings.

Deficiency Narrative: During the inspection two employees were missing normalcy training
Correction Narrative:
TD sent an email with the following information: 

I have attached the 2 Normalcy trainings and the 1 CPR/First Aid training that were past due for RV and for Jose LB, for which we were cited.

I have also included a blank Training Tracker which we are using for all staff moving forward so that we remain compliant with required trainings.

Deficiency Narrative: Observed deterioration to wood structure and windows in building.
Correction Narrative:
ED will provide licesing an update regarding the updates of the bids for the repair of the operation, first update will be completed by 2/19/2021, then, if the company performing the bid accepts the bid by the operation it will take 7 days for board member to review, this will give the operation a compliance date of 2/26/2021.

Operation has 3 possible bids, operation had delays due to the winter severe weather, however, the operation will update Licensing with any updates. The operation provided emails in which there was communication with the bidders,

Deficiency Narrative: During the walk through of the operation it was discovered that the only restroom in the cafeteria did not have running hand water on the hand washing stattion.
Observed deterioration to wood structure and windows in building. Napkins were observed on windows in place of weathering. Shower curtain rods were falling out of place.
During the Inspection we reviewed a total of 4 staff files. 1 of the 4 files was missing a notarized affidavit for one of the employees.
Correction Narrative: AMIKids Rio Grande Valley has provided the missing employee notarized affidavit.

Deficiency Narrative: While conducting the inspection it was discovered that the annual fire inspection was expired. The fire inspection was overdue by 9 months.
Correction Narrative: An e-mail was received from AMIKIDS with the new fire inspection for the operation. On the same day (11/10/2020) it was also requested a correction plan not given to licensing till 11/17/2020.

Deficiency Narrative: While reviewing personnel files it was discovered that 1 out of 4 files  did not have a TB test on file.
Correction Narrative: An e-mail was received from AMIKIDS with the results of the TB test for the corresponding employee that was missing the TB test.

Deficiency Narrative: A Staff Member was involved in a small altercation with a Youth in Care and bumped chests with the youth. The Staff Member could have handled the matter differently and showed a lack of prudent judgment.
Correction Narrative: Training was reviewed at the operation all training was completed on or by 12/14/2020. The staff was also given a final written reprimand on 12/8/2020.
